explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques for stock index pattern discovery and prediction.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep learning models like LSTM and MLSTM-FCN for time series prediction.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses neural network-based models such as LSTM and FCN (Fully Connected Networks) for prediction tasks.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions the use of LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) networks for predicting stock indices.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses LSTM networks, including TPA-LSTM and MLSTM-FCN, for time series prediction.
explanations.clustering: The paper uses Toeplitz Inverse Covariance-Based Clustering (TICC) for discovering repeated patterns in stock indices.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper compares the proposed method with traditional methods including Support Vector Machine (SVM).
explanations.SVM: The paper mentions SVM as one of the traditional methods compared against the proposed architecture.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper uses Temporal Pattern Attention (TPA) in the TPA-LSTM model, which involves attention mechanisms.
